findings.title: Deployer can set max transaction amount greater than 0
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set a maximum transaction amount exceeding zero, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set max wallet amount greater than 0
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set a maximum wallet amount greater than zero, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can block/unblock users
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to block or unblock users.

findings.title: Team Addresses Can Update Fees Amount Up to 100%
findings.description: The team addresses have the capability to update fees amount up to 100%, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause the contract.
